I must write quickly ,: for soon , soon , the Milk will awake within me again .
but you will have been warned .
but I will continue to exist ,
though I live in nightmare now .
I too was once tempted by the smooth , sweet creaminess of Tuscan Milk , 1 Gallon , 128 Fl Oz .
that the Milk was forcing it 's hosts
to speak of the goodness of the Milk that the Milk might spread ,
that it might acquire new hosts in which to live ,
Beware the sweet seduction of the Milk !
How smooth , how creamy , how exhilarating , uplifting , fulfilling and enlightening !
How free it made me feel !
But then came that terrible moment
when in my home town supermarket ,
I reached for a gallon of store brand milk ,
Oh , the pain the Milk can give !
Equal in intensity to the first joy that the Milk can give , but pain !
Words alone can not describe it !
I live in fear of the Milk , a Slave to the joy
that I must come to the Milk like a supplicant ,
And the cowardice that I feel ,
that I can not face the pain it can inflict .
Do not let this be your fate !
it is not too late for you . . .
